EmailTemplate.name: Nurture - WhiteSpace-PricingPlan.Reminder-2
EmailTemplate.subject: Better Pricing Plans Are Ready for You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
Sean from Grand & Toy here once again. I’m reaching out one last time because I don’t want you to miss out on the amazing opportunity to update your outdated pricing plan.
As your account manager, I’ve been working hard to get you better pricing plans and have come up with two options that would be better suited for you. By making the switch you will get better paper pricing at either $37.10 on 9915 Grand & Toy Paper or $42.90 on OX9001 Boise Paper. You will also get stronger offers on national brand products or Grand & Toy private label products.
When you make the switch, you will be provided with a 10% off coupon on your first purchase which will be valid until December 20, 2019.
Need a closer look at these new free pricing plans? You can check them out here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Nurture---WhiteSpace-PricingPlan_WhiteSpace-PricingPlan-Master.html]]>.
If you have any questions or don’t feel as though these 2 plans satisfy your needs, feel free to contact me.
Sincerely,
Sean Beauchemin Inside Account Manager
900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z7 E-mail: seanbeauchemin@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:seanbeauchemin@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 1-800-348-2184 Ext: 44170 Fax: 1-613-244-0765 Toll Free/Sans Frais Fax: 1-866-391-8555 Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom | Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents
grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
